tool_description: Sends push notifications to mobile applications with survey invitations, supporting both iOS and Android platforms with rich media options.

content_id.description: Content identifier from Survey Content Builder

device_tokens.description: Array of mobile device push tokens

badge_count.description: Badge count to display on app icon

deep_link.description: Deep link URL to open when notification is tapped

error_messages: Invalid content ID: Provided content_id does not exist or is not optimized for mobile push.
Invalid device tokens: Ensure all device_tokens are valid push notification tokens.
App ID not found: app_id is not registered or accessible.
Notification content too long: title must be under 50 characters, body under 200 characters.
Invalid badge count: badge_count must be a non-negative integer.
Sound file not found: Specified sound file is not available in the app bundle.
Device token limit exceeded: Maximum 2,000 device tokens allowed per push campaign.
usage: Provide content_id, device_tokens array, app_id, and notification content. Optionally configure badge_count, sound, and deep_link. The tool handles push delivery across iOS and Android platforms.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for the push notification campaign

notifications_queued.description: Number of push notifications queued for delivery

delivery_status.description: Initial delivery status of the campaign
